name: Stockhawk
tagline: Access real-time stock information to stay on top of the market
body:
# Introduction
Android application build using Yahoo Finance API and hosted on Google Play Store.
Displays stock information including a graph with zoom capabilities supporting English, Arabic ( RTL ) and Hindi language.
Application is accessible to sight-impaired users using Google Talkback and also includes a widget.

## Feature List
* Supports English, Hindi, and Arabic Language with RTL support.
* Displays a graph with zoom capabilities.
* Also includes a widget which helps you track stocks from your home page.
* Talkback support for sight-impaired users.

[![Available on Google Playstore](https://ajitesh-tiwari.github.io/Extras/Google-Play-button.png)](https://play.google.com/apps/publish/?dev_acc=06710053395401255227#MarketListingPlace:p=com.ajitesh.android.stockhawk)
